description: *1.1.1 Update: You can now modify game mechanics in the preferences menu for some very silly game-play! (scoring off while this mode is on)*  Topple Ball Mini is a fun and exciting game for the webOS operating system.  This is a free version of the Topple Ball game and contains 15 levels.  The object of the game is to direct the ball into the goal by tilting your device.  Where the ball goes and how fast it goes depends on the angle you hold your device.  Get the ball into the goal in the shortest amount of time to get the highest score.  As you progress through the levels, there will be several obstacles to avoid.  Eventually the game will require a lot of precision and dexterity.  The full version now contains 200 levels and is now available in the U.S. on the App Catalog.
